Bright, becomes	13.961827491107185
Bright, but	13.961827491107185
Bright, scatterbrained	13.961827491107185
becomes, treat	13.26868031054724
drugs, treat	11.659242398113138
'', drugs	11.476920841319183
``, treat	10.870785037748869
'', becomes	9.542986883310586
``, becomes	9.519176234616868
drugs, with	9.376860012436612
., becomes	7.98547658180925
ROOT, becomes	7.965375402488163
